Package io.artframework

Interface Trigger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ArtObject
    public interface Trigger
extends ArtObject
    A Trigger is used to trigger actions and check requirements.

    Use this interface to mark your class as a trigger and add the ART annotation.

    If your trigger has requirements implement the Requirement interface.

    Make sure that you register your Trigger with the TriggerProvider.

    Execute/call the trigger by using the Scope.trigger(Class) or ART.trigger(Class) method to create a TriggerExecution. Then call TriggerExecution.execute() after adding the targets to the trigger. 

    
 // register the trigger
 scope.register().trigger().add(MyTrigger.class);
 // and then call the trigger like this
 scope.trigger(MyTrigger.class).with(player).execute();
